name.hi: नियत गुणनफल के साथ अनुपात उलट

embedding_text: Ratio Reversal with Constant Product in percentage problems where reversing ratios helps find unknowns.

trick.name: Reverse Ratio Trick
trick.hinglish_description: Jab bhi ratio diya ho aur product constant ho, ratio ko ulta karke unknown values nikaalo. Ye trick SSC exams mein jaldi answer dene ke liye kaam aati hai.

steps.step: Identify the given ratio and calculate the total parts.
Calculate the actual number of parts using the total population.
Use the percentage given to find the number of married individuals.
Reverse the ratio for the other group and calculate.
Calculate the percentage of the other group using the reversed ratio.

common_mistakes: Forgetting to convert fractions to percentages.
Miscalculating the total number of parts.

teaching_content.deep: Is pattern ko samajhne ke liye, pehle ratio aur proportion ka concept clear hona chahiye. Phir, ratio reversal kaise kaam karta hai, isko step-by-step samjho. Har step pe dhyan do, jaise ki ratio ko ulta karna aur percentage calculate karna.
teaching_content.shortcut: Jab bhi ratio aur constant product mile, ratio ko ulta karke doosre group ka percentage nikaalo. Ye trick jaldi answer dene mein madad karti hai.
teaching_content.instant: Ratio ko ulta karo aur percentage nikaalo. Ye SSC exams mein time bachata hai.
